answers.answer: Ukrainian refugees can find out the steps needed to enroll their child in kindergarten, school, or after-school classes by following the link provided on the page.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/education-useful-information and read the section under 'Information on how to enroll your child in an educational institution'.

answers.answer: JRS Romania offers a kindergarten program for preschool children and a school program for first graders.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/education-useful-information and read the section under 'Kindergarten and school from JRS Romania'.

answers.answer: Children can enroll in Angel Appeal kindergarten by calling +40723293769 (Camelia Raita) or +40770560741 (Oana Pasalan).
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/education-useful-information and read the section under 'Kindergarten by Angel Appeal Romanian Foundation'.

answers.answer: Angel Appeal kindergarten is open from Monday to Friday, from 10:00 to 17:00.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/education-useful-information and read the section under 'Kindergarten by Angel Appeal Romanian Foundation'.

answers.answer: The Ostrovok Educational Hub offers classes for students from 0 to 11th grade in Sector 2 and from 0 to 6th grade in Sector 4.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/education-useful-information and read the section under 'The “Ostrovok” Educational Hub in Bucharest'.

answers.answer: Students can access free classes at the Ostrovok Educational Hub by contacting the respective phone numbers for Sector 2 (021 252 5700) or Sector 4 (021 335 5705).
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/education-useful-information and read the section under 'The “Ostrovok” Educational Hub in Bucharest'.

answers.answer: The Taras Shevchenko Ukrainian High School in Maramureș offers teaching in the Ukrainian language.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/education-useful-information and read the section under 'Ukrainian secondary school Taras Shevchenko in Maramureș'.

answers.answer: Students can find free access and download digital versions of Ukrainian textbooks for grades 1-11 from the link provided on the page.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/education-useful-information and read the section under 'For studying by yourself: digital textbooks'.

answers.answer: The Ukrainian Online School serves students in grades 5-11.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/education-useful-information and read the section under 'Online school from the Ministry of Education of Ukraine'.

answers.answer: One can access the Ukrainian Online School platform through the link provided in its section, which offers free access to education, video tutorials, tests, and self-study materials.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/education-useful-information and read the section under 'Online school from the Ministry of Education of Ukraine'.

answers.answer: UNICEF provides access to online platforms that support children's education, helping them continue studies, develop new skills, and stay engaged.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/education-useful-information and read the section under 'UNICEF's Support for Children's Educational Journey: Access to Learning Platforms'.
